default_profile.label: General Discovery
default_profile.summary: Quickly learn how the business acquires customers today, what slows them down, and whether automation, marketing, or infrastructure updates would unlock growth.
discovery_prompts: What do you rely on today to generate new customers or bookings?
Which manual tasks still eat up time for you or your team?
If you could wave a wand and fix one operational bottleneck, what would it be?

profiles.label: Local Hospitality & Retail
profiles.summary: Focus on lifting foot traffic, online reviews, and rapid response to inbound calls for restaurants, cafes, salons, spas, gyms, or boutique retail.
discovery_prompts: How do you currently handle missed calls or booking requests?
What channels drive most of your new guests right now?
Are you investing in online reviews, loyalty, or retargeting campaigns?

profiles.label: Travel & Tourism
profiles.summary: Keep tours and trips full by fixing slow quotes, missed calls, and stale trip pages.
discovery_prompts: How do you handle calls when several families ring in at once?
Do web or ad leads get a same-day quote from your team?
What slows you down most when you build or update itineraries?

profiles.label: Professional & B2B Services
profiles.summary: Highlight scheduling automation, CRM integration, and thought-leadership funnels for agencies, consultancies, law, finance, or medical offices.
discovery_prompts: Which parts of your client intake or onboarding are still manual?
Do you have visibility into pipeline performance or deal velocity?
Where do prospects fall off today—response times, follow-up, education?

profiles.label: E-commerce & Digital-First Brands
profiles.summary: Lean into conversion optimization, personalized marketing automation, and AI-driven support for online stores or subscription brands.
discovery_prompts: How are you personalizing the buying journey for repeat customers?
Which KPIs are you watching—conversion rate, AOV, repeat purchases?
Where do support tickets pile up—shipping, returns, product education?

profiles.label: Tech, SaaS, and Startups
profiles.summary: Position Cloumen as a product acceleration partner—AI integrations, cloud scaling, DevOps, and data visibility.
discovery_prompts: What roadmap items keep slipping because of limited engineering time?
How automated is your deployment, monitoring, and rollback process?
Where could predictive insights help—churn, usage, lead scoring?

profiles.label: Media, Streaming & Entertainment
profiles.summary: Showcase GPU-powered streaming pipelines, CDN optimization, and multi-channel monetization for broadcast or OTT campaigns.
discovery_prompts: What challenges do you see with encoding, reliability, or latency today?
How are you planning to monetize or analyze viewer engagement?
Do you have GPU infrastructure in place or rely on off-the-shelf tools?

voice_ai.name: Voice AI & Call Automation
voice_ai.value_prop: Friendly AI agents pick up overflow calls, qualify the caller, and leave clear notes for your team.
hook_openers: We talk with a lot of {industry} teams who miss calls when things get busy. Does that happen to you?
I noticed {company} gets plenty of interest. How do you make sure someone answers if two families call at once?
discovery_questions: What happens when a call comes in after hours or during your rush?
Do you have a quick way to text back or log details when you miss a call?
status_checks: Overflow or after-hours calls reach a person and not just voicemail?
Automatic callback, SMS, or email goes out when you miss a call?
Notes or CRM updates created without staff typing them in?
voice_ai.value_if_missing: Always-on call coverage keeps interested callers warm and frees your team from constant phone duty.
proof_points: 24/7 voice agent that books appointments, sends recaps, and syncs with your CRM.
Custom call flows that match your brand tone and escalation rules.
upsell_paths: Pair with marketing automation so campaigns trigger instant follow-up.
Layer reporting that shows call reasons, win rates, and saved staff hours.

marketing_growth.name: Digital Marketing & Growth Funnels
marketing_growth.value_prop: Simple paid and organic campaigns across search, social, and email that bring steady leads you can track.
hook_openers: Your reviews and site look strong. How are you keeping new demand coming in?
When travel season spikes, do you get enough qualified leads online or does the list feel thin?
discovery_questions: Which channel sends you the best customers today?
Do you run remarketing or loyalty flows to bring people back?
Do you track which ads or posts turn into real trips?
status_checks: Active paid search or social campaigns with tracked results?
Email or SMS nurtures for past travelers?
Clear view from ad click to booking?
marketing_growth.value_if_missing: Dialed-in growth keeps trips full, warms past guests, and shows where spend is worth it.
proof_points: Full-funnel content calendars plus paid ads with simple dashboards.
Creative and analytics team that tweaks weekly based on cost per lead.
upsell_paths: Bundle with web modernization for fast landing pages and better SEO.
Sync campaigns with AI voice follow-up so every warm lead hears back fast.

web_modernization.name: Web & App Modernization
web_modernization.value_prop: Fast, clear sites and booking flows that make it easy to inquire from any device.
hook_openers: How quickly can someone book or request help from your site today?
Does your site still feel current and fast on a phone?
discovery_questions: When was the last refresh of your site or app?
Can you see where visitors drop off in the form or checkout?
How hard is it for your team to update trip info or promos?
status_checks: Site optimized for mobile speed and modern design?
Clear booking or contact buttons with basic analytics in place?
Marketing can update content without waiting on engineering?
web_modernization.value_if_missing: A modern, fast experience builds trust, lifts conversions, and lets marketing move quickly.
proof_points: Next.js or Laravel builds tuned for speed, SEO, and simple editing.
CMS or headless setup so teams change content in minutes.
upsell_paths: Connect to analytics dashboards for live conversion tracking.
Add personalization and AI suggestions for returning visitors.

travel_playbooks.name: Travel Sales Playbooks
travel_playbooks.value_prop: Shared workflows that keep inquiries, quotes, and balances organized so trips stay on track.
hook_openers: Many travel teams juggle calls, quotes, and payments in different tools. How do you track it today?
When a family asks for a custom trip, how do you make sure nothing slips?
discovery_questions: How long does it take to send a fresh quote once someone calls?
Where do you keep open itineraries and payment reminders?
Who follows up if a traveler has not paid their balance yet?
status_checks: Single place to see every open inquiry and quote?
Template or checklist for building itineraries fast?
Automatic reminders for balances, waivers, or travel docs?
travel_playbooks.value_if_missing: Simple playbooks keep trips moving, stop hot leads from going quiet, and save the owner from chasing details.
proof_points: Boards or CRM stages that show owner, status, and next action for every trip.
Automations that send quote follow-ups and remind travelers about documents.
upsell_paths: Layer AI voice follow-up so missed calls drop straight into the same board.
Add dashboards that show bookings won, lost, and revenue per package.

automation_ops.name: Workflow Automation & Integrations
automation_ops.value_prop: Replace manual spreadsheets and hand-offs with orchestrated automations across CRMs, calendars, ERP, or custom apps.
hook_openers: I hear many teams still chase spreadsheets - which parts of your process feel the most manual?
When a new lead/customer lands, how many systems do you have to update by hand?
discovery_questions: Which tasks steal the most hours from your team each week?
How many separate systems do you update when a new order/client arrives?
status_checks: Manual copy/paste between CRM, booking, invoicing?
Triggers or automations when status changes?
Single source of truth dashboards for operations?
automation_ops.value_if_missing: Automation keeps the team focused on high-value work, eliminates errors, and gives real-time visibility.
proof_points: Integration layer using Python/FastAPI, Zapier alternatives, or custom middleware.
Dashboards that show real-time status of leads, jobs, or service tickets.
upsell_paths: Add AI summarization or decisioning on top of automated workflows.
Expand into analytics dashboards for leadership reporting.

cloud_devops.name: Cloud Engineering & DevOps
cloud_devops.value_prop: Design, migrate, and optimize infrastructure for reliability, cost control, and rapid deployment.
hook_openers: When you ship code today, is it a button click or an all-hands fire drill?
How confident are you in uptime and response if traffic spikes this weekend?
discovery_questions: What is your current deployment process—manual or automated?
Do you struggle with uptime, scaling costs, or observability?
status_checks: CI/CD pipeline with automated tests & rollback?
Monitoring/alerting stack tied to SLAs?
Infrastructure-as-code and cost optimization cadence?
cloud_devops.value_if_missing: A solid DevOps backbone shortens delivery cycles, keeps uptime predictable, and avoids runaway cloud bills.
proof_points: AWS/Azure/GCP reference architectures with Terraform or Pulumi.
CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and incident response baked in.
upsell_paths: Bundle with GPU infrastructure for AI workloads.
Create executive dashboards for platform health and cost trends.

custom_ai.name: Custom AI & Data Products
custom_ai.value_prop: Fine-tuned models, embeddings, and AI apps that automate decisions, personalize experiences, or unlock new services.
hook_openers: You likely sit on a ton of data — are you putting it to work for predictions or personalization yet?
If your team had an AI copilot tomorrow, where would you deploy it first?
discovery_questions: Do you collect data that could power predictions or personalization?
Where would an AI copilot save your team the most time?
status_checks: Centralized data warehouse/lake ready for modeling?
Existing AI experiments or pilot programs?
Use cases where decisions rely on gut vs data?
custom_ai.value_if_missing: Custom AI turns raw data into automations, better customer experiences, and new revenue streams.
proof_points: LLM fine-tuning, retrieval augmented generation, and multi-modal agents.
Secure deployments on your cloud with compliance and monitoring.
upsell_paths: Combine with voice/chat agents for omni-channel support.
Add dashboards so stakeholders can validate AI outcomes.

media_streaming.name: Media & Streaming Infrastructure
media_streaming.value_prop: GPU-accelerated live and on-demand streaming pipelines with low latency and robust monitoring.
hook_openers: How confident are you in quality when streams hit peak viewers?
Do you have the analytics you need on viewer engagement and monetization?
discovery_questions: How do you currently encode and deliver your streams?
What SLAs do you need for uptime and quality of service?
status_checks: Automated, multi-bitrate encoding with redundancy?
GPU acceleration or cloud pipeline to control costs?
Visibility into stream quality, outages, and viewer metrics?
media_streaming.value_if_missing: Robust streaming infrastructure protects viewer experience, unlocks monetization, and keeps operations hands-off.
proof_points: FFmpeg + NVENC pipelines, multi-bitrate HLS/DASH packaging, and DRM.
Automation for channel scheduling, ad insertion, and analytics.
upsell_paths: Extend into monetization dashboards and audience insights.
Integrate personalized recommendations using custom AI.

consulting_strategy.name: Technology & Growth Consulting
consulting_strategy.value_prop: Help leadership pick the next wins, set a simple plan, and bring the people to ship it.
hook_openers: Which big ideas keep getting pushed because no one has time?
Do you feel clear on which tech project would move the needle this quarter?
discovery_questions: Which projects are stuck because you lack time or the right team?
Do you know which work is maintenance versus true growth bets?
Who owns keeping the plan on track week to week?
status_checks: Simple roadmap with owners and dates?
Dedicated leads for automation, AI, or web efforts?
Regular review to check KPIs and adjust?
consulting_strategy.value_if_missing: A steady partner keeps the plan real, brings hands to deliver, and frees leaders to focus on clients and growth.
proof_points: Fractional CTO/CMO support that builds clear roadmaps with simple metrics.
Cross-functional squads that ship work and train your team as they go.
upsell_paths: Spin up dedicated squads once the plan is green-lit.
Set up lightweight governance and reporting cadences.
